title: Partner Asks Pre-Sales Technical Question
description: A reseller partner contacts the channel manager with a technical question from a potential customer about API rate limits.

tasks.description: Receive the question from the partner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the partner's technical question.

tasks.description: Look up the API rate limits for different subscription tiers in the product documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the exact rate limits for each plan.

tasks.description: Provide a clear and accurate answer back to the partner so they can respond to their lead.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent empowers the partner to continue their sales process.
